title: Affordable Housing – Rent Reduce – Lux at Stoughton
posting_body: ['Lux at Stoughton - Stoughton MA', 'REDUCED PRICE: $1,975/Month ♦ 1-Bed/1-Bath ♦ 80% AMI', 'Please visit our website for income restrictions:', '<URL>', 'This is not a Lottery.', 'Live the good life at Lux at Stoughton.', 'Located an easy commute away from both Boston and Cambridge, this amazing community offers one and two-bedroom apartments in Stoughton, MA with luxurious finishes and plenty of space for working, entertaining, or just relaxing at home.', 'Living here gives you direct access to a wide range of amenities designed to perfectly fit your life.', 'Spend time in our premium outdoor community space, work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center or take your favorite pup to the dog park.', "Discover the best of everything in a location that puts you to close to it all including the area's best shopping and dining.", "Schedule a tour today and learn more about what makes Lux at Stoughton one of the area's best places to live!", 'Amenities & Features', 'BBQ Grill ♦ Carport ♦ Ceiling Fan ♦', 'Dishwasher ♦ Dog Park ♦', 'Double Pane Windows ♦', 'Full-Size Washer & Dryer ♦ Island Kitchen ♦ New Bathroom Fixtures ♦', 'Outdoor Lounge with Firepit ♦ Oversized Closets ♦', 'Pet friendly ♦ Storage ♦', 'Two-Tone Paint ♦ Upgraded Window Treatments ♦', 'Washer/Dryer ♦', 'Location', '3101 STAGECOACH ROAD, STOUGHTON, MA, USA', 'Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.', ' You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.', 'Frequently Asked Questions:', '♦', 'Will the affordable units be able to rent parking?', ' If so, garage or off street and how much per month?', 'Not included in rent, additional monthly rental cost', '♦', 'What utilities are the renters responsible for?', 'Tenants are responsible for all utilities.', 'Additional Information', 'Maximum of 2 pets per unit.', 'There is a fee of:', 'Cat: $75 per month', 'Dog: $75 per month.', 'Breed restrictions apply.']
